com.usc.bill.service

Interface UserManagmentService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserManagmentSerivceImpl

    @Service
public interface UserManagmentService
    A common interface to handle business operations that concerns user-related data
    Version:
    1.0 11/19/2017
    Author:
    WU, Alamri, STROUD

    • Method Detail

      • checkAccess

        boolean checkAccess(StudentProfile studentProfile)
        check whether the current logged-in user has a privilege to access student profile
        Parameters:
        studentProfile - where to check whether logged-in user has the access to
        Returns:
        true if is accessible by logged-in user, otherwise, false

      • getByUserId

        User getByUserId(java.lang.String userId)
        get user by the given userId
        Parameters:
        userId - an id of user
        Returns:
        user associated with a given user id

      • getLoggedInUserId

        java.lang.String getLoggedInUserId()
                            throws UserNotFoundException
        to get the logged-in user's id
        Returns:
        logged-in user's id
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if there is no user is logged-in with a the time of requesting

      • getUserIdsUnderAdminPrivilidge

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUserIdsUnderAdminPrivilidge()
                                                         throws UserNotFoundException,
                                                                UserPermissionException
        to get all users' id fall under the privilege of the current logged-in user
        Returns:
        list of users fall under the privilege of the current logged-in user
        Throws:
        UserPermissionException - in case the logged in user has no administration privilege to access other users' id
        UserNotFoundException - in case there is no user is logged in.

      • loadUsers

        void loadUsers(java.lang.String filename)
        throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
               org.json.simple.parser.ParseException,
               java.net.URISyntaxException
        to load users contained in file that is formated as a JSON into the system datasource
        Parameters:
        filename - name of file where the records of user existed
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the given filename has improper format
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the file associated with a given filename doesn't exist
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - if the file associated with a given filename couldn't be parsed into JSONArray

      • login

        void login(java.lang.String userId)
    throws UserNotFoundException
        user to login with a given an id of user
        Parameters:
        userId - an id of user
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - if the user associated with a given id is not existed in the system

        void logout()
        current logged-in user is logged-out
